title: Golden Hour Street at neighborhood
summary: Practice Street using Fujifilm X-T5 with 35mm F2 in Color mode.
steps: Go to neighborhood and observe lighting.
contingencies: If weather changes, switch subjects but keep same gear.
safety_note: Stay aware of surroundings; respect people & property.
